document_data.caption: A chunk of beeswax.
document_data.name: Beeswax
document_data.mainbody: '''Beeswax''' was a chunk of wax made from melting beehives of either [[bee]]s or [[giant bee]]s.{{Cite dragon/179/Magic by Candlelight|17}}
document_data.Description: This substance typically had a dark yellow coloration.
document_data.Availability:
* [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']] sold beeswax for 1 [[silver piece]] per {{SI|1|lbs.|k}}.<ref> The catalogue also sold scented beeswax<ref> and [[candle]]s made of the substance.
* In the city of [[Skullport]], the business [[Sisters Three Waxworks]] sold small and slender scented candles made of beeswax.<ref>
